Title: Setting Up Coupons on Xiaohongshu
Content: To set up coupons on Xiaohongshu, first visit the website ark.xiaohongshu.com and log in. Navigate to the 'Marketing' section and focus on two main activities: 'Event Registration' and 'Product Promotions.' Event registration allows you to participate in official events that can drive traffic to your store. For product promotions, you can set up discounts to attract customers. For example, if you are selling a cup, you can create a promotion by setting the original price and the discounted price. Ensure the promotion period is long enough to avoid frequent changes. Compare your prices with competitors to ensure your discounts are attractive. This strategy helps in increasing conversion rates and attracting more customers.

Title: Importance of Competitor Analysis in Pricing
Content: Competitor analysis is crucial when setting prices for your products. By understanding how much your competitors are charging, you can set competitive prices that attract customers while ensuring profitability. For instance, if a competitor is selling a raincoat at a certain price, you can set your price slightly lower to attract more customers. This approach helps in positioning your product effectively in the market. Additionally, consider any platform-specific discounts or promotions that might affect the final price. For example, Xiaohongshu often offers new customer discounts, which should be factored into your pricing strategy. By keeping an eye on competitor prices and platform promotions, you can set optimal prices that enhance your market position.

Title: Setting Up Mobile Coupons on Xiaohongshu
Content: To set up mobile coupons on Xiaohongshu, go to the 'Marketing' section and select 'More Tools.' Click on 'Coupons' and then 'Create New.' Choose 'Specific Products' and set the discount details, such as the amount and validity period. For example, you can set a discount for a specific product category like 'new arrivals' or 'best sellers.' Ensure that the coupon details are clear and attractive to encourage customers to use them. You can also set limits on the number of coupons each customer can use to manage your promotions effectively. This strategy helps in driving sales and increasing customer engagement by offering targeted discounts.
